bibl.title: Menander and Plautus: a Study in Comparison. An Inaugural Lecture Delivered at University College London 5 February 1968.

Handley Erik Walter, Menander and Plautus: a Study in Comparison. An Inaugural Lecture Delivered at University College London 5 February 1968.
